description: A React Native mobile application that allows users to browse and apply for developer jobs. The app fetches job data from the J Search Rapid API using Axios, a popular promise-based HTTP client, and implements features such as job type filtering, search functionality, pagination, and job details pages.

I am builing a full-stack E-Commerce web application with Admin Dashboard using Next.js 14 App Router, React, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, and other latest technologies to strengthen my skills developing complex client-side routing, authenticated flows, reusable components, and integrated payments. Configuring the dev environment, designing the admin and store UI, modeling backend entities with PrismaDb, enabling cart functionality, and finalizing Stripe checkout.

uses RFID dog tags and a user interface to track and optimize pets water intake in real time. Users can set customized hydration goals for each pet and the system automatically dispenses water to ensure optimal hydration levels. The intuitive interface provides at a glance monitoring, insightful analytics, and mobile access to each pets hydration data. It allows owners to easily stay on top of their pets drinking patterns. While functional, the current interface was a proof of concept developed under tight timelines. With more time, it would be completely redesigned to maximize usability. This project was my senior capstone and won first place recognition for innovation in improving pet health.
